name: CI/CD
description: Tests, automation and management of the project

name: bug
description: Something isn't working, or a fix is proposed

name: can't reproduce
description: Root cause unlikely to come from the project

name: documentation
description: Update to non-code (manual, readme, tutorial, docstrings, ...) and its generation

name: duplicate
description: This issue or pull request already exists

name: enhancement
description: Improvement or change of an existing feature

name: feature request
description: Something not existing yet that need to be implemented

name: good first issue
description: A place for newcomers to start contributing

name: wont do/fix
description: This will not be worked on
